alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Seminole, northwestern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maytown, or 8 miles northeast of Geneva, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Smyrna Beach, Edgewater, Oak Hill, Scottsmoor, and Bethune Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
